TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ToolboxItemWrapper extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public NotInheritable Class ToolboxItemWrapper Implements INotifyPropertyChanged

Docs.summary: Represents a wrapper used to establish link between an actual instance and the tool representation, as well as add support for categorization of toolbox items. This class is , so it cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This wrapper class provides support for the categorization of toolbox items when re-hosting the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)]outside of [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)].

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default constructor initializes the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.ToolName%2A>, <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.BitmapName%2A>, and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.DisplayName%2A> properties with an empty `string`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type toolType) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the type of the tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.ToolName%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.AssemblyName%2A> properties can be extracted from the `toolType` parameter. The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.BitmapName%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.DisplayName%2A> properties are each initialized with an empty `string`.

Public Sub New (toolType As Type, displayName As String)

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the type of the tool and a specified display name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.ToolName%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.AssemblyName%2A> properties can be extracted from the `toolType` parameter. The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.BitmapName%2A> property is initialized with an empty `string`.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the assembly name for the toolbox item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the assembly name is changed, an event is raised to indicate that the property value has been changed. The set operation is idempotent: if the assembly name is set to a value that it already has, there is no change.

Docs.exception: The assembly name has already been specified and cannot be changed after the corresponding has been initialized.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the name of the tool is changed, an event is raised to indicate that the property value has been changed. The set operation is idempotent: if the assembly name is set to a value that it already has, there is no change.

Docs.exception: The name of the tool cannot be changed after the corresponding has been initialized.
